lead_paragraph: Brazilian striker Neymar is teaming up with Michael Jordan to become the first soccer player with a boot endorsed by the basketball great.

headline.main: Neymar Will Be the First Soccer Player to Wear Jumpman Boot
headline.print_headline: Neymar Will Be the First Soccer Player to Wear Jumpman Boot
